name: Demo- Internal Gravity
description:
Thanks to Deyum for hosting this game Jam!
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCliACYjYqDt7yqSXKo4f4fQ

This is my first Game Jam and my first game I made that's not a tutorial. It was a lot of fun and I learned a lot of useful skills and better understanding of this craft.  Best to use .exe file, still have the visual bug of the horizontal lines appearing at some points when playing in browser.

https://itch.io/jam/the-completion-jam

The theme for this game is Out of Place

In Internal Gravity the players own gravity is out of place, putting the player in odd places and finding different ways to beat the level. When I learn more about Programing I'll add more features! 

If you have any feedback or want to collaborate feel free to email me at kopinnaththiyagalingam@gmail.com

Use arrow keys/WASD to move and E to flip gravity and Q to reverse and Release Space bar to Shoot Magic bubbles! 

Reach the cave exit to win

Made in Godot Engine

Asset Credits

https://grafxkid.itch.io/

https://opengameart.org/users/kotnaszynce

SFX

https://kenney.nl/assets?s=gui

Plugins used

https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/109
